short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The easiest way to capture feedback. Just select the text and categorise it right away.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome extension allows you to capture user feedback from anywhere on the web and categorize it right away with the help of AI. 

You can link insights to topics—right in the plugin! All done in one step.

Specific helps you build a product people want. Centralize user feedback and automatically categorize insights. Launch targeted AI surveys to gain deep insights from the right users.
